The point of STOCK CAR racing was to determine which manufacturer was building the best car. Fans watched the cars race on Sunday and then could go to a dealership and buy the same car. The cars were the purpose for the race. Sure drivers mattered too, but not as much as the cars. Now cars race and they all look alike. The engines are spec'd. The weight is spec'd. The tires are spec'd. The aerodynamics are spec'd. Nothing is unique and innovative among the cars. That makes NASCAR BORING!!!!
